new.title: New in here? Don‚Äôt worry!
new.text:
In a fishbowl, there are 5 seats available where conversation takes place. If there is a free seat you can join the conversation at any time. Just one rule: there must always be a seat available.

If all 5 seats are occupied and you have already participated, leave your seat free so that the rest can contribute as well.

hostIntroduction.title: What happens now?
hostIntroduction.hostText: When you start the fishbowl, you can start by making an introduction. The camera and microphone will be active just for you. When you're done, don't forget to allow attendees to join the conversation.
hostIntroduction.participantText: When the fishbowl starts, the host can make an introduction. After this, all participants will have permission to join the conversation.

shareScreen.title: Share your screen!
shareScreen.description:
• During the introduction, you can share screen, if you need it.
  • This feature is only available for you as a Host and will no longer be active when you close the introduction.
  • You can only share screen with your computer, never with your phone.

appControls.title: How can I interact?
appControls.text:
• Join the conversation and exit the conversation using the green and red buttons.
  • Control the microphone using the button Unmute/Mute.
  • Connect with attendees by accessing their Linkedin and Twitter profiles (if they have provided them).

end.title: All good things have an end...
end.hostText: You will see a notification in the upper right when there is 1 minute for the fishbowl to finish. When this happens, access to join the conversation will be closed for all attendees except for you. It is time to close the fishbowl and say goodbye to the participants.
end.participantText: You‚Äôll notice on the top right when the fishbowl has 1 minute left. Once this happens, the access to join the conversation will be closed to all attendees except for the host.
